item.description:
What kind of luck you seek is up to you but if you're into the numbers this may be the place, since the address is Seventy Seven.

The Sevens passes the KISS principle. so join happy hour friends for conversation, laughs and fun in an unassuming friendly neighborhood pub with darts, a jukebox, pitcher's of beer and sandwiches.....simple and unpretentious.

ONLY beer and wine are served.....NO cocktails.

Check out MBTA or Hop Stop to create your route by public transit. Charles/MGH (red line) is closest (five (5) minute walk) subway station. Park Street (green & red lines), Government (green & blue lines) and Downtown Crossing (orange & red lines) subway stations are no more than a fifteen (15) minute walk.

Get there when you can. I'll arrive at 5 and hang until 7.....unless????

The first new member who finds me, gets a free drink. Don't be shy...Say hi
I'll be wearing a red Roxbury baseball cap.

PLEASE MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB OR PAY AS YOU ORDER - THANK YOU
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing a red baseball cap with Roxbury in black lettering
item.name: Let's Try Our Luck at The Sevens on Monday May 18th
